description.name: Yubikey
description.tagline: Second factor authentication via a hardware device.
description.long:
Yubikey is a hardware based Two-Factor Authentication device.

When plugged into the USB port of any PC, when the capacitive button on the Yubikey is pressed, the device generates and enters a one-time password (OTP) character string.

For more information, visit the Yubico website.
